column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " What 's going on ? "
#Text=Aang says : " Fire Nation soldiers are heading toward the village ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " What did you do ? "
#Text=Katara says : " I kind of destroyed their factory . "
#Text=Sokka says : " You what ? "
#Text=Katara says : " It was your idea ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " I was joking !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Leave !
#Text=Do nothing !
#Text=" Katara says : " No , I will never , ever turn my back on people who need me !
#Text=I 'm going down to that village , and I am gon na do whatever I can .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait !
#Text=I 'm coming , too .
#Text=" Katara says : " I thought you did n't want to help .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You need me , and I will never turn my back on you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , you really do have a heart .
#Text=" Aang says : " He really does have a heart , does n't he ?
#Text=" Mung says : " I thought we could live as neighbors , in peace .
#Text=But I guess I was wrong .
#Text=You steal our food , our medicine ... and then you destroy our factory .
#Text=" Dock / Xu says : " We did n't do any of that .
#Text=Yeah , the Painted Lady brought us food .
#Text=She 's the one that healed our sick , not your medicine .
#Text=" Mung says : " Oh , right , the mysterious Painted Lady did it .
#Text=And I suppose she drew the army emblem on your containers , too .
#Text=This is a town of thieves and liars !
#Text=Where 's your Painted Lady now ?
#Text=We 're going to cure the world of this wretched village .
#Text=" Mung says : " Light it again !
#Text=" Female Fire Nation soldier says : " Look at that !
#Text=Where 's it coming from ?
#Text="
